page.title: 12Dumfries Rowing Club
page.content: In Dumfries there are many sports clubs and one of them is the Rowing Club. It has many regattas and sponsored rows each year. Recently the club raised Â£1000 in a sixteen mile sponsored row. Soon the club is going to have a regatta on the River Nith in Dumfries (22nd June 1985). Quite a few are expected to come from all over the south of Scotland and the north of England. Many schools have boats at the club for their pupils. There are about twenty boats in all: three eight-crew boats, seven four-crew boats, two pair boats, seven one-man boats and a new learner boat for one person that helps beginners get used to rowing. Not all of the boats are Nithsdale's - some are borrowed and others are kept there but have certain owners.
